website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an LG TV that's likely to fit your budget, this model has a lot to offer, including notable sound, 4K UHD, and smart technology - all for a surprisingly affordable price.
pros: Has a lot of features consumers love in modern TVs, including crisp 4K resolution, voice control, and the brand's Al ThinQ technology
55-inch screen is large but not overwhelming for small spaces
cons: Known to occasionally lose connection to WiFi, which is disruptive when streaming apps

website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this is a good option for consumers who prefer the LG brand and a practical screen size without spending a lot of money.
pros: Features the brand's ThinQ technology that allows you to control its functions with your voice
In addition to the vibrant picture quality, this TV emits rich sound
Price falls on the middle of the scale
cons: Some connectivity issues have been reported, causing apps to crash or become unresponsive

website_summaries.verdict: Smart technology that is designed to impress and a combination of notable video and audio quality make this LG 4K TV a close contender for our top spot.
pros: Has the brand's extremely intuitive Al ThinkQ technology and Alexa compatibility
Easy to set up and stream
Picture and sound quality are both impressive
cons: Some owners have griped about occasional drops in WiFi connectivity

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at tv's for a long time and this is a definite winner. The picture and sound are amazing, and the remote is fun to use. Switched from Samsung and I will never go back. I play Xbox on this TV and so far it's the clearest picture I've ever had, and I've used: 2 different Vizio, 2 different Samsung, and a Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Marie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best in class of this price range. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great because I chose it at the first place reading 100s of reviews, comparing features and what this TV is capable of. Unfortunately, I changed my mind meanwhile due to their sudden price drop. As a result I had to return it. But I'm still with the decision I made in choosing this. You can't go wrong investing on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Puru

customer_reviews.title: White stripe in the middle
customer_reviews.text: It has a white stripe in the middle of the screen when it supposed to be black. Missing some colors compared to other TV we have. Will return if possible.
customer_reviews.author: tamir

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality not good
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the introduction on tv. hdr movies are unwatchable even with local dimming off. back light goes crazy with local dimming on . i have flash lighting both top corners and will be returning. The picture quality is not that great. It's 4K, but not nearly as vivid as I'd hoped it world be. I played around with settings and the color hoping I could really bring it to life, but because it wasn't helpful. All 4K tv's are not created equally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most user friendly tv I’ve ever owned. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is the best one I’ve ever had. The remote is incredibly handy and usual. I like being able to speak into the remote instead of wasting a ton of time with the old-school alpha numeric keypad or scrolling through a keyboard on the TV. And the wireless mouse is one of the best features I’ve ever seen. It’s super handy when scrolling through apps and menus or typing words. The 4K quality is fantastic. I’ve owned seceral Samsungs in the past and this TV by far supersedes them in overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: CK Twain

customer_reviews.title: Quality TV at great price point.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Had for several months and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Babygurl

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse bad inspection and assessment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv from Amazon warehouse. The descrition was used good. Description mentions missing power cable, open box, and missing video cables. However, the display screen was broken, remote control and stand legs were also missing. Disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chester N.

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!!
customer_reviews.text: The advanced technology in televisions is so tremendous, but you're not aware until you finally upgrade. I am amazed at the difference. The five star rating is not because I know/think this set is any better than others as I haven't a clue. It is for the fantastic installation done by the Amazon contractors. To simply hang the TV on the wall, the cost is $99. But to hang it AND bury the wires behind the sheet rock was just $50 more! The two fellows (both of whom were deaf) did a great job. (And communicating wasn't as difficult as I would expect. )GREAT JOB!!
customer_reviews.author: Kokimoe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of led tvs and they usually suck when it comes to sound quality, this one sounds like the speakers are in the front and customizable easy to select surround, cinema, clear voice and more options. Plus full (UHD) on all 4 hdmi ports that can be setup for separate color options on each port. My old TV set the color and brightness for all inputs couldn’t set them separate. Perfect color since it’s Nano Cell it has billions of colors instead of millions like older oleds. My last tv was a 4K Samsung 2016 it lasted just over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: jemullins1

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than base models from LG
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 65UK7700 along with a less expensive 65UK6090PUA. The 7700 model has noticeably better backlighting ...especially for bright backgrounds and from an angle. We also like the magic remote and the bluetooth keyboard/headphone support. The 7700 was worth the price premium in retrospect.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that I would be frustrated hooking this TV up to my TIVO and other accessories as I am not particularly tech savvy, but I was pleasantly surprised. However I only use this TV for watching streaming, live TV and DVDs--no games or anything like that so I cannot comment on that. Love the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but does not support the Spectrum TV App
customer_reviews.text: Clear, sharp picture. Good sound quality. Very satisfied. The only regret I have, which is not the fault of LG, is that it does not support the Spectrum TV app. I have Spectrum TV service. If I had researched it properly before purchasing, I would have found that only Samsung smart TV's support the Spectrum TV app, and would likely have purchased a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Nice Budget 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: Have this product in my living room and it does the job. It’s fairly bright, looks nice and picture quality is good for the price. Blacks could be better. Sound quality is not great but I use a sound bar anyway so it’s not a problem. LG usually makes a quality product so I expect this to last. Good deal if on a budget but if you have more money there are better options.
customer_reviews.author: D William

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week now. All I can say is best valued 65" out there in my opinion. For 799 bucks......its really a no brainer. Set up was a cinch
customer_reviews.author: Dansarge

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent. Sound is so much better than my old Panasonic that I no longer need my sound bar to get quality surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv for price
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the tv was good except that it hates to talk to other apps and it's on and off with amazon echo alexa. such as i can turn off tv, volume up and down, but i can't change channel or turn tv on. even after downloading the app a bunch of time and re-registering it still doesn't work...same goes with google assistant/home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture great sounds
customer_reviews.text: Great TV connects well to the internet wirelessly even in an older gone with thick walls. Good app selection and easy to navigate everything with the remote. Sound quality is good too I don't normally turn it above ten because it's enough lol It's also lighter weight than I expected so I may mount it to the wall eventually
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Reliable quality. Feels/looks like you can walk right into the picture.
customer_reviews.text: My place is now THE place to watch TV!! LG makes superior televisions!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally B.

customer_reviews.title: We love our new TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend! We mounted it in our master bedroom and are in love! The remote and everything about the operating system is pretty damn easy! We love prime video and use it daily on this new tv!!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Stunning picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: This device displays incredible detail and color accuracy. The "sweet spot" seems to be 6-8 feet from the screen. Sound quality is also above average. The remote and operating system are quite easy to learn. Overall a very satisfactory video experience.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV! I like that it connects directly with Netflix, youtube, etc. Every time we watch TV, my husband says "look at that quality".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: The picture was better on my 10 year old tv. We are having trouble using it. Very complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Shire

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect upgrade. I'm a big fan of LG TV's and this was a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: no hdpc2 connection no 4k streaming
customer_reviews.text: see above. connected my xbox one to the hdmi connection no hdr no blue ray hdr no wonder it only has 41 veviews
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, well constructed. Easy to use, quick set up.
customer_reviews.author: wayne allen

customer_reviews.title: randomly shuts off
customer_reviews.text: randomly shuts itself off while playing video games. No easy way to fix it, loss of signal and instant shutdown mid fight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Directions suck,
customer_reviews.text: Picture not as good as our old Panasonic,and cant get rid of the annoying voice on the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: charles dyer

customer_reviews.title: Overall brightness not great
customer_reviews.text: Some things look great and some things don't. Overall brightness seems to be lacking even after tinkering with the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tv
customer_reviews.text: Great tv, clear picture, great sound. Very impressive for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Decent for bright picture only
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent budget tv, but the advertised "local dimming" is non existent. The smallest amount of white against a black background creates bleed throughout the whole picture.
customer_reviews.author: BC8588

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tv! No issues at all. Alexa feature needs some improvement but excellent tv
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: The Tv is. Well worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. Great picture quality. Sound is amazing.my first 65 inch. And I'm a satisfied customer. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Screen cracked
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get a chance to turn it on. The screen was cracked when we unpacked it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy tv, love the remote only issue is sometimes the picture is dark.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Beat value on the market
customer_reviews.text: Top notch in every category and a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Bade Allegro

customer_reviews.title: HDMI 2 non functional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price, but after it was all set up, shipping material discarded my son tried hooking up a gaming system to find out the HDMI 2 doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Ok tv
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected. But a good price to a good television set
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a whole lot about TVs so I went on Consumer Reports ratings. This was the best TV for in our price range. We opted for the professional wall mounted install, which was sooo worth it. We like nature shows and this is almost like being there.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Wifi won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tv for about a year. Picture and sound are both great, however, the wifi contiously disconnects and you have to manually type in the wifi password numerous times. No other devices in the house lose connectivity. Very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Merlin&Dugout

product_meta.title: LG Electronics 55UK7700 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:55-inchThe UK7700 is expertly crafted with a brushed metal frame that both blends with and enhances any space. This new LG UHD TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ becomes the hub for the smart home: Using Intelligent Voice control, speak into the LG Magic Remote to pull up family photos, control light settings, check the weather and more. The UK7700 uses a powerful quad-core processor that minimizes video noise and enhances sharpness, paired with the truer colors, deeper black levels and reduced reflectivity of Nano Cell™ Display. Together they deliver a remarkably lifelike 4K picture, enjoyable from a wider viewing angle. This LG 4K TV also supports multiple formats of HDR content, including HDR10 and HLG, both optimized with scene-by-scene picture adjustment.

*Service limited to certain languages. Some features require 3rd party service subscription.Resolution : 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160)
feature_bullets: TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 48.7" W x 28.4" H x 2.5" D | With Stand – 48.7" W x 30.7" H x 9.1" D | Screen size: 54.6” measured diagonally | Weight – 35.9 lbs. | Legs distance – 42.6” | Voltage – 100-240V | Frequency – 50-60Hz

LG UHD TVs with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ become the hub for your connected smart devices. Beyond apps and entertainment, LG AI TV uses intelligent voice control to create a hub for the smart home and beyond.
The multi-format 4K high dynamic range support includes HDR10 and HLG, both with LG’s advanced tone mapping technology that provides scene-by-scene optimization.
Quad-core processor that minimizes video noise and enhances sharpness. Ultra Luminance
Inputs: 2.0 HDMI (4) | USB (2) | 1 RF | 1 Composite in | 1 Ethernet | 1 Optical | Audio Return Channel Support via HDMI

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
